title: Titanic Hydra Jax Build Top Lane - Patch 6.21

embed.description: Hey yo, here's the 4-1-1 folks. If you get some Malphite dissing your fly girl, give em one of these. AD REDS - ARMOR YELLOWS - MR BLUES - ASPEED QUINT 21-0-9 (Fervor) Titanic Hydra on Jax is Ultra Strong right now. Playing it exclusively as I feel it's the optimal build.

body: Check out a new Jax build which I feel could be the most optimal build path for Jax right now.
